channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Rare Barracuda Spectacle Caught on Camera by Taiwanese Diver
item.description: A rare barracuda “tornado” has been caught on camera in waters off Taiwan’s southern coast. A diving instructor photographed the ray-finned fish in Kenting, drawing the attention o

item.title: Taiwan Civic Groups Are Raising Alarm Over Legislative Reforms
item.description: Civic groups in Taiwan are ringing the alarm over reforms introduced in Taiwan's legislature.

item.title: Protesters Gather Outside Taiwan's Legislature Against Reform Bill
item.description: Tens of thousands of protesters have gathered outside Taiwan's legislature for the third time this week to oppose a legislative reform bill they say threatens the country's democra
